distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for lua53 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-6706: Fixed a use-after-free bug in the lua_upvaluejoin function of lapi.c (bsc#1123043)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Lua 5.3.5 has a use-after-free in lua_upvaluejoin in lapi.c. For example, a crash outcome might be achieved by an attacker who is able to trigger a debug.upvaluejoin call in which the arguments have certain relationships.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
